description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to increase access to short-term employment and to basic social and economic services in areasaffected by the crises, both global and internally-generated.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II.A.1 | Description :The Recipient shall monitor and evaluate the progress of the Projectand prepare Project Reports in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.08 of the General Conditions. | Frequency :Quarterly
